branchCategory.name: 10/11/21/22-C(D)J2, Air Cylinder, 6mm Bore Double Acting, Single Rod, Clean Room
branchCategory.description: <P>Series CJ2 miniature clean series cylinders available in double acting styles offer stainless steel tubing and stainless steel rods. The series is available in bore sizes 6, 10, 16mm and stroke lengths from 15 to 200mm.  Mounting options include basic, foot, and front flange. Series CJ2 is auto switch capable.</P>

breadCrumb.name: 10/11/21/22-C(D)J2, Air Cylinder, 6mm Bore Double Acting, Single Rod, Clean Room
